Hero.name: Harentsoa
Hero.dynamicBioPhrase3: Bringing ideas to life with code.

Career.pageSubtitle: Discover my academic and professional journey, marked by enriching experiences and stimulating projects.
Career.fullStackDescription: Development and maintenance of web and mobile applications, database management, API integration, and collaboration with teams for innovative solutions.
Career.codeIgniterDescription: Design and implementation of features for CodeIgniter-based web applications, performance optimization, and bug resolution.

ServicesSection.subtitle: I offer a comprehensive range of services to transform your ideas into high-performing and innovative digital solutions.
ServicesSection.webDevelopmentDescription: Creation of responsive, high-performance, and secure websites and web applications, from front-end to back-end.
ServicesSection.mobileDevelopmentDescription: Design and development of native (iOS/Android) or cross-platform mobile applications with React Native.
ServicesSection.backendApiDevelopmentDescription: Building robust back-ends, RESTful APIs, and microservices to power your applications.
ServicesSection.technicalConsultingDescription: Support and technical expertise for your projects, from design to software architecture optimization.

SkillsPage.description: Here's an overview of the technologies and tools I master, categorized for better visibility of my expertise.

IndexPage.schoolManagementSystemDescription: A complete application for managing students, courses, grades, and timetables in an educational institution.
IndexPage.wineManagementApplicationDescription: A system to manage wine stocks, plots, harvests, and sales for a vineyard.
IndexPage.personalPortfolioWebsiteDescription: My personal portfolio showcasing my projects, skills, and professional experiences.
IndexPage.carSalesManagementPlatformDescription: An application to manage car inventory, sales, customers, and generate reports.
IndexPage.realTimeWeatherApplicationDescription: A mobile application displaying real-time weather forecasts for any city.
IndexPage.scientificSocialNetworkDescription: A platform for researchers and academics to share publications, collaborate, and discuss scientific topics.
IndexPage.aiTrainingGenerationDescription: A project focused on generating training data for artificial intelligence models, including data augmentation.
IndexPage.carMusicPartyDescription: An application to synchronize music across multiple devices for a shared car party experience.
IndexPage.dentalPracticeManagementSystemDescriptio: A comprehensive system for managing appointments, patient records, billing, and daily operations of a dental practice.

Contact.intro: Whether you have a question, a project proposal, or just want to say hello, feel free to contact me. I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations.
Contact.name: Name
Contact.thanks: Thank you for contacting me! I will get back to you as soon as possible.
